<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Parry and Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1558) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Opportune Riposte](/Classes.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation. You can use [Opportune Riposte](/Actions.aspx?ID=551) against an enemy who fails at a Strike against you (not just critically fails), provided you have both damaged that creature with a finisher on your last turn and currently have a circumstance bonus to AC from the [parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190) weapon trait, [Dueling Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=1514), or [Twin Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=377).
name: Parry and Riposte
